content: knitted suit for babies in drops baby merino the piece is worked top down with moss stitch sizes 0 4 years pattern bm-149-by yarn group a **sizes** sizes 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years child s height in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92-104 **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio 200-250-250-250 300-300 g colour 49 desert rose **buttons** drops buttons no 628 5-5-5-6 6-6 items **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with a 1 = 10 x 10 cm
